resources.string:
Munch is real-time food truck locator. It's purpose is to allow food truck owners to update their customers in real-time regarding their location, hours, and any other updates. In addition, customers are allowed to rate and review the food trucks. 

This app is intended for Austinites looking for a good bite anywhere in the city!
"

"Major: Electrical and Computer Engineering 
Bio: Hello! I’m a 3rd year ECE major, with a focus in software engineering. In my free time, I like to go out and explore Austin with my friends, read, be a Longhorn, and when I can, go to the many amazing food trucks that Austin has!
Responsibilities: Backend and frontend development
"

"Major: Electrical and Computer Engineering 
Bio: Hey, I’m Rafael. When I’m not at school I enjoy listening to music, exercising, and eating Tacos
Responsibilities: Frontend development
"

"Major: Electrical and Computer Engineering 
Bio: Hey ya’ll! My name is Syed. I am a final year Electrical and Computer engineering major, with a focus in software engineering. In my free time I love to spend time with my family, friends, and watch all things HBO and Netflix. I also love to go out and eat with said family and friends at all the local amazing food trucks!
Responsibilities: Frontend Development and system design
"

Responsibilities: Frontend development and mockups
